name: Save The City (Jan_Hunter)
description:
This game was made for VimJam 2: Boss [8 Bits to Infinity] About: this game is about you have to Save the City Story:

One day there was a city called (Cube City) and the city was live in peace but one day the (Circle City) attacked the (Cube city) and there was a cube Called him (Defender) and you are the (Defender) and you have to save the city from occupation

Controller: WASD TO MOVE Player ECS To Pause The Game Credit: Music: https://audionautix.com Pixel Keyboard layout: https://xphere.itch.io/pixel-keyboard-layout Team: Jan_Hunter (Game developer and Artist) Andy_Hunter(GameTester and story writer)
